titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Record Center at 9700 Page Boulevard, Overland, Missouri, as the "SSG Charles F. Prevedel Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 635.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Public Works and Transportation. Report No: 100-1007.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk: House amendments to Senate bill.

vote.text: Senate agreed to the House amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/4/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the Federal Records Center Extension Building in Overland, Missouri, as the Charles F. Prevedel Federal Building.
